title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.4 - Displaying lights
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.4 - Displaying lights

State Regulations

Every vehicle, during the period from one-half hour after
sunset to one-half hour before sunrise, and during fogs, shall display legal
lights front and rear. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
654.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
